goals__remit: Biodiversity is endangered by the loss of pollinators. Aware of the responsibility we have in the protection of bees, we consider that it is only viable to an ecological and sustainable beekeeping bee welfare wherever priority productive stress. Consumers should support organic projects near your area, sharing the risks and benefits with the producer.
